metadata.description:
The classic, Silver Age adventures of the Man of Steel...back when he was merely the Boy of Steel! As Superboy, the young Clark Kent protects his hometown of Smallville from threats large, small and downright bizarre--all while trying to keep his secret identity hidden from his boyhood crush Lana Lang! 

These stories continue in: Superboy and the Legion of Super-Heroes!
metadata.name: Superboy
